topic.title: Adding a Concept to a Specification Reference Set

body.section: To add the selected concept to an existing refset, right click in the expression building area as shown in .

The refset associations entered are not final in the database until you click the Commit button at the bottom right of the IHTSDO IDE window. To clear the current entries (instead of committing them), click the Cancel button at the bottom right of the IHTSDO IDE window. Remember, that member refsets need to be computed from the specification refset once the query expression has been modified.
